alert.note: Alert for Fajardo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 01 at 1:48AM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM AST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...The municipality of Fajardo. * WHEN...Until 345 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Urban flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 145 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain could cause additional urban flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
